name: Skully Pinball
description:
Skully Pinball is a game that reproduces the classic machines of the 90s in two different themes!

Show who is the boss of the scary skeleton of the Day Of Dead machine or relax on the beaches of Octopus Island.

What will be your best score?



Features :

■ Complete 3D machine!
■ 2 different themes!
■ Unique soundtrack for each theme!
■ Dynamic audio !
■ 4 camera angles!
■ Local leaderboard!
